com.intellect25.model

Class Facade

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellect25.model.Facade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Regex

    public class Facade
extends java.lang.Object
implements Regex
    This class is using pattern FACADE for the Parser. It gives capacities simple access to the complexity structure of the Entities
    Author:
    Riabchenko Aliona
